text:
[Verse]
Running through the night
City lights
Out of sight
Dreams that fill our minds
Catch the stars
One at a time

[Verse 2]
Take my hand
We'll fly
Touch the clouds
Way up high
Moonlight guides our way
In the sky
We will stay

[Chorus]
Chasing the stars
We'll go far
Never looking back
In the dark
Hold on tight
Dreams ignite
Chasing the stars tonight

[Verse 3]
Dancing in the rain
Nothing lost
All to gain
Hearts beating as one
Shining bright
We're the sun

[Bridge]
Every step we take
Every risk we make
No regrets
No fear
In our hearts
Dreams are clear

[Verse 4]
Boundless night
Endless flight
Through the dark
Find the light
Hand in hand
Side by side
In the stars
We confide
title: Chasing the Stars
